thread.title: BRIEF-Cargurus Inc Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.02

title: BRIEF-Cargurus Inc Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.02
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Cargurus Inc:
* CARGURUS ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER 2017 AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 49 PERCENT TO $90.6 MILLION * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.05
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.02 * SEES Q1 2018 TOTAL REVENUE $93.5 MILLION TO $94.5 MILLION
* SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.01 TO $0.02 * SEES 2018 NON-GAAP EPS $0.14 TO $0.16
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.01, REVENUE VIEW $86.2 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.12, REVENUE VIEW $383.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.02, REVENUE VIEW $88.7 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
